attributes.action: encourage people to walk more by lowering the tax on footwear
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Walking is a fundamental part of everyday life, it reduces the chances of obesity and enables people to be healthier and fitter. By lowering the amount of tax people are paying on footwear, there is the likelihood that a fitter population will result with less cars on the roads and less pollution in the air.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
